Sentencas: A ceramic-based, meso-scale fuel processor for on-board production of syngas fuel was demonstrated for applications in micro-scale solid-oxide fuel cells (mu-SOFCs).
Titulo: A low-temperature co-fired ceramic micro-reactor system for high-efficiency on-site hydrogen production

Sentencas: The processor had a total dimension of 12 mm x 40 mm x 2 mm, the gas reforming micro reactor occupying the hot end of a cantilever had outer dimensions of 12 x 18 mm.
Titulo: A low-temperature co-fired ceramic micro-reactor system for high-efficiency on-site hydrogen production

Sentencas: The device was fabricated through a novel progressive lamination process in low-temperature co-fired ceramic (LTCC) technology.
Titulo: A low-temperature co-fired ceramic micro-reactor system for high-efficiency on-site hydrogen production

Sentencas: Both, heating function and desired fluidic structures were integrated monolithically into the processor.
Titulo: A low-temperature co-fired ceramic micro-reactor system for high-efficiency on-site hydrogen production

Sentencas: Using catalytic partial oxidation of a hydrocarbon fuel (propane) as a reaction model, a thermally self-sustaining hydrogen production was achieved.
Titulo: A low-temperature co-fired ceramic micro-reactor system for high-efficiency on-site hydrogen production

Sentencas: The output flow is sufficiently high to drive an optimized single membrane mu SOFC cell of about the same footprint as the micro reactor.
Titulo: A low-temperature co-fired ceramic micro-reactor system for high-efficiency on-site hydrogen production

Sentencas: Microsystem design, fabrication, catalyst integration as well as the chemical characterization are discussed in detail.
Titulo: A low-temperature co-fired ceramic micro-reactor system for high-efficiency on-site hydrogen production
